text: Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a large sauté pan over medium-low heat and sauté the onion and garlic until golden.  Add diced pumpkin and 1 cup of boiling broth, cover the pan and simmer for 10 minutes.  Add the rice, stir and add a ladle-ful of boiling stock. Before adding each ladle full of stock, make sure the previous stock has been completely absorbed into the rice. Be sure to gently stir with a wooden spoon as you don't want to mash the rice. This process of adding the broth & stirring should take about 18-20 minutes. Remove from heat, add salt and pepper to taste and stir in the remaining butter and Parmesan.  Serve immediately.
